content.raw:
We should prefix all our functions and macros with `ign_` to avoid potential conflicts with macros or functions defined by other projects.

I'm having trouble finding an authoritative source on this, but I believe function and macro declarations are always put into the global scope, so if a different `FindOPTIX.cmake` module were to define its own `OPTIX_find_api_library` and both were used in the same build system, ours could collide with theirs and result in unexpected behavior.
